Default_: ^Ciao! It’s nice to see a new face around here. I am new myself, but I can probably answer any question about this tiny town.
UncleLucca_: ^Ol’ Lucca is probably getting the bakery ready for the day or he might be playing cards with the other old men. I didn’t know he had a niece, he never really mentioned family.
GrandpaGiovanni0UncleLucca: ^I don’t know much about what happened, you are better off asking Lucca or other people about it, I am sure they would be willing to considering you’re Giovanni’s granddaughter.
